name: Poktapokalypse
description:
Poktapokalypse is a short metroidvania with breakout mechanic featuring the Maya culture's ball game.  For this project pico-8 was used. 

You are a Maya player traversing through different levels to find the end. 

Controls MoveArrow keys right & leftGrab BallArrow key downTeleportxJumpArrow key upKick Ballc

Developers:

  • TillerQueen
